channel.title: UK Internets
channel.description:
So, I need some new internet.
My current package sucks balls. I can barley hit 500kb (Probably the line though..) and I keep getting disconnected every few times a day. It's also running out soon, when TalkTalk want me to upgrade to a package with 40gb download limit for more than I'm paying now.
I've looked into a few solutions, and this is what I need:
[ul][li]Line rental[/li] [li]~8mbps (Copper lines suck)[/li] [li]Preferably business broadband[/li] [li]Static IP (Above)[/li] [li]As much bandwidth as I can get[/li] [li]Any-time calling to UK landlines[/li] [li]Less than £30/month (Cheapskate student ftw)[/li][/ul]
Currently I've found:
[ul][li]Opal (£30 setup, £29/month, unmetered calls after business hours, static ip, 100gb bandwidth)[/li] [li]Plusnet (£0 setup, £33/month, unmetered any-time calls, static ip, 80gb bandwidth, unmetered overnight)[/li][/ul]
Anyone else know of any other decent ISPs?

item.title: UK Internets
item.dc:creator: @chri5 chri5
item.description:
@chri5 wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:11, topic:329416”]Nildram.

Really good service.[/quote]
Which seems to be Opal, 100gb usage, 25p /mb after that…

Read full topic

item.title: UK Internets
item.dc:creator: @chri5 chri5
item.description:
@chri5 wrote:

sanga282:

virgin media? fibre line if you’re able to get it

chri5:

Also no Virgin.

Will probably be going with Plusnet; unmetered in off peak hours!

item.title: UK Internets
item.dc:creator: @sup000 sup000
item.description:
@sup000 wrote:

i have sky, its free for the first 6months if you take the unlimited package with phone line. i easily hit 1.7MB download speeds. Never been so happy with my internet(s)

Read full topic

item.title: UK Internets
item.dc:creator: @chri5 chri5
item.description:
@chri5 wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:6, topic:329416”][quote author=mwiebelhaus link=topic=425803.msg3135335#msg3135335 date=1266895241]
By copper lines do you mean phone line?
[/quote]
That’s most likely the case. I know here in Australia the majority of people have copper telephone lines which they use for their ADSL connections.[/quote]
This is true.

item.title: UK Internets
item.dc:creator: @chri5 chri5
item.description:
@chri5 wrote:

[quote=“eczema3, post:3, topic:329416”]I suggest bethere, their (i think) ‘unlimited’ package gives you 24mbps, unlimited downloads, no line rental fee, no set up fees, one static ip for only £16/m oh and you get a free 4 port 100mbps wireless router.

https://www.bethere.co.uk/web/beportal/beunlimited

sounds like a bargain to me![/quote]
Can’t get adsl2 on my line… Only standard ADSL. Also no Virgin.

Read full topic
